Skill_MP_BigChickC_N_7.description: 1라운드 후에 착탄하는 소이탄을 발사해 목표 범위에 {0} 보호무시 화염 속성 피해를 줍니다. 경장형 또는 중장형 대상이 이동불가 상태면 피해량이 크게 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_BlackKnight_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_BlackKnight_EW_5.name: Attack Dispersion
Skill_MP_BlackKnight_EW_5.description: At the start of round, if there are 5 or more allies, grants self and allies in Area of Effect Area Damage Dispersion up to 80%.

Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_1.name: Tyrant's Bite
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_1.description:
Deals $(2) damage to a single target, and inflict DEF -50% for 2 rounds.
Lower target's HP increases DMG dealt by Tyrant's Bite, up to 40%.
When Tyrant's HP is above 50%, remove target's DR buff.
When Tyrant's Bite hits, increases Predator stack by 1.

Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_2.name: Primal Flame
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_2.description:
Activates if Predator stacks is at max or if there is no enemy in range of Tyrant's Bite at start of the round.
Deals $(1.7) Fire damage to target area that Ignore Protect, and inflict Fire Resist -15% / -20% / -25% for 2 rounds with 1 / 2 / 3 Predator stacks.
Consumes all Predator stacks

Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_3.name: Prey Search
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_3.description:
When hit, temporairly changes Prey target and, if there is no other Tyrant when the round begins, enter into Prey Monipolization mode. Focus attacks on the Prey and when Tyrant is attacked, removes Provoked debuff applied to self.
Prey (Heavy) : 100%~60% HP, When hit with Fire Damage
Prey (Light): 60%~30% HP, When hit with Ice Damage
Prey (Flying): 30%~0% HP, When hit with Electric Damage
Prey Monopolization: ATK +50% / ACC +300%. Effects are removed if Tyrant is hit 3 times.

Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_4.name: Primitive Instinct
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_4.description:
When attacking, removes all Protect effects from targets and inflicts Marked to self.
At the start of each round, grant self DEF +30% / Status Resist +50% / DR +30%.

Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_5.name: Roar
Skill_MP_Tyrant_Challenge1_5.description:
At the start of wave, grants Battle Continuation with 30% HP to Tyrant and 30 chance to inflict Silenced to all enemies for 2 turns.
When Battle Continuation activate, increases Tyrant's SPD +300%, but removes all Battle Continuation affecting Tyrant.
When Tyrant's defeated after activating Battle Continuation, deals Fixed Fire DMG equals to 200% ATK to all enemies.

Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_1.name: Weakness Analysis
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_1.description:
Deals $(1.3) damage to target area and inflicts SPD- / Damage taken Increased.
SPD- / Damage taken Increased effects are increased based on the number of Weakness Analysis stacks, and when there are 3 stacks, also inflicts AP-.

Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_2.name: Analysis Completed: Utilization
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_2.description:
Deals $(1) damage to target area, with 10% chance to inflict Stunned.
If Robert's affected by ATK- / DEF- / ACC- / CRIT- / SPD- / EVA- debuffs, inflict the same debuffs to hit target for 2 rounds: ATK -20% / DEF -20% / ACC -20% / CRIT -20% / SPD -30% / EVA -50%.
If Robert's affected by max stack of Weakness Analysis, increase the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%, and remove all Weakness Analysis stacks.

Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_3.name: Cradle of Evolution
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_3.description:
At the start of round, grant allies in Area of Effect ATK +10% / ACC +70%, and grant self DEF +10% / Barrier +300 for 1 round.
Gain 5% extra ATK / ACC / DEF buffs and 100 extra Barrier after the 4th / 8th round.

Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_4.name: High Speed Operation
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_4.description:
After using Weakness Analysis Active, grant self Weakness Analysis buff. Grant allies in Area of Effect SPD +20% / +25% / +30% for 1 / 2 / 3 Weakness Analysis stacks.
If hit by Elemental attack while affected by max stack of Weakness Analysis, inflict self Calculation Error, and remove all Weakness Analysis stack.
At the start of round, if affected by Calculation Error, remove all buffs from self and allies in Area of Effect, and inflict self Stunned for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_5.name: Weakness Overcoming
Skill_MP_Robert_Challenge1_5.description: At the start of round, if self or allies' affected by ATK- / DEF- / ACC- / CRIT- / SPD- / EVA- debuffs, grants the same type of buff for 2 rounds: ATK +20% / DEF +20% / ACC +20% / CRIT +20% / SPD +30% / EVA +50%.

Skill_MP_BigChickCG_N_7.title: askill7
Skill_MP_BigChickCG_N_7.name: 테르밋 소이탄 폭격
Skill_MP_BigChickCG_N_7.description: 1라운드 후에 착탄하는 소이탄을 발사해 목표 범위에 {0} 보호무시 화염 속성 피해를 줍니다. 경장형 또는 중장형 대상이 이동불가 상태면 피해량이 크게 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_1.name: Shock Bomb
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_1.description: Deals $(1) damage to target area, and inflicts SPD -30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_2.name: Indiscriminate Bombardment
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW3_2.description:
Deals $(1.25) damage to target area that Ignore Protect.
Additional Electric DMG +50% to targets affected by SPD-.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_1.name: Shock Bomb
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_1.description: Deals $(1) damage to target area, and inflicts SPD -30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_2.name: Indiscriminate Bombardment
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW4_2.description:
Deals $(1.25) damage to target area that Ignore Protect.
Additional Electric DMG +50% to targets affected by SPD-.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_1.name: Shock Bomb
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_1.description: Deals $(1) damage to target area, and inflicts SPD -30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_2.name: Indiscriminate Bombardment
Skill_MP_LightningBomber_EW5_2.description:
Deals $(1.25) damage to target area that Ignore Protect.
Additional Electric DMG +50% to targets affected by SPD-.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_1.name: Ruin's Advent
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_1.description:
Deals $(1.5) damage to target area.
Additional DMG +200% to targets affected by Erosion.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_2.name: Erosion
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_2.description:
Deals $(1) damage to target area.
Damage is decreased by 25% for non-center targets.
On hit, 30% chance to inflict Push Back, removes all buffs, inflicts Range -2 for 3 rounds and inflicts ATK -60% / -30% / -10%, DEF -90% / -45% / -15% for 3 / 2 / 1 rounds.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_3.name: Granting Blessing
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_3.description:
At the start of round, depending on Nest's HP, grants Nest buffs and grants surrounding allies gradually stronger buffs.
Granting Blessing Phase 1 (100% ~ 80% HP): Grants self ACC +50%. Grants allies ATK +20% / DEF +50%.
Granting Blessing Phase 2 (80% ~ 50% HP): Grants self ACC +80% / Defense Penetration +50%. Grants allies ATK +30% / DEF +80% / ACC +100%.
Granting Blessing Phase 3 (50% ~ 0% HP): Grants self ACC +100% / Defense Penetration +50% / Ignore Barrier / DR. Grants allies ATK +50% / DEF +100% / ACC +150%.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_4.name: Barrier Deployment
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_4.description:
At the start of battle, gain Barrier Deployed status.
When hit, gains a stack of Readying Barrier Deployment status, and when it reaches 4 stack, gains Barrier Deployed status, gaining Nullify Damage status for 5 hits for 3 rounds.
If hit while affected by Barrier Deployed status, remove debuffs on itself.
When ally's destroyed, Barrier Deployed is forcefully removed, and inflict self Damage taken Increased +30% for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_5.name: Injection System Destruction
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_5.description: When hit with Elemental Attack while affected by Barrier Deployed, inflict a stack of Damaged Ejection System to self, and when hit while affected by 3 stacks of Damaged Ejection System, inflict Ejection System Destroyed to self, and become unable to use Corrosion.

Skill_MP_Nest_EW_6.title: askill6
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_6.name: 본체 파괴
Skill_MP_Nest_EW_6.description: 네스트가 파괴될 시, 사출된 모든 기계들도 같이 파괴됩니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_1.name: Shield Blow
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_1.description:
Deals $(1.1) damage to a single target.
If the target is affected by EVA-, 50% chance to inflict unremovable Stunned for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_2.name: Chick Guard Post
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_2.description: Grants unit unremovable Row Protect for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_4.name: Berserk - Shielder
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_EW_4.description: At the start of round, grants unit DEF +10% permanently.

Skill_MP_NightChickSP_EW_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickSP_EW_4.name: Berserk - Sniper
Skill_MP_NightChickSP_EW_4.description: At the start of round, grants unit CRIT +20% permanently.

Skill_MP_Tracker_TU5_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU5_2.name: Bloody Claw
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU5_2.description:
Deals $(1.4) damage to target area, remove all buffs from target, and inflict Bleeding for 3 rounds.
Deal 50% less damage to non-primary target.
When affected by Frenzy, inflict Great Bleeding instead of Bleeding.
Target inflicted with Bleeding and Great Bleeding takes 550 / 600 Fixed Damage at the end of each round.

Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_1.name: 스티프 미사일
Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_1.description: 목표 적에게 쇼크 미사일을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주며, 행동력을 낮춥니다.

Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_2.name: 레이더 경보
Skill_MP_Sparrow_N_2.description: 범위 내 아군에게 경보를 해 2r 동안 적중률과 회피율을 올립니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_1.name: 이동 불가 사격 I
Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_1.description: 기관총을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주고 이동 불가 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_2.name: 이동 불가 사격 II
Skill_MP_NightChickTT_N_2.description: 기관총을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주고 이동 불가 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_1.name: 스킬 불가 사격 I
Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_1.description: 미사일을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주고 스킬 봉인 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_2.name: 스킬 불가 사격 II
Skill_MP_NightChickTT2_N_2.description: 미사일을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주고 스킬 봉인 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_1.name: 실드 강타
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_1.description: 적을 방패로 강타해 {0} 피해를 주며, 일정 확률로 행동 불가 상태로 만듭니다.

Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_2.name: 실드 전개
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_2.description: 같은 열에 있는 대상이 공격당하는 경우, 가로막아 자신이 대신 맞습니다.

Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_3.name: 두꺼운 방패
Skill_MP_HarvesterS_N_3.description: 두꺼운 방패로 인해 최종 피해량이 일정 이하인 경우, 공격이 무효화됩니다.

Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_1.name: 충격탄 사격
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_1.description: 충격탄을 발사해 {0} 피해를 주며, 2라운드 동안 대상의 방어력을 낮춥니다.

Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_2.name: 대 보병 지뢰
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_2.description: 목표 지점에 밟으면 폭발하는 대 보병 지뢰를 설치합니다. 경장형 또는 중장형에게만 피해를 주며, 5라운드 후에 자동으로 제거됩니다.

Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_3.name: 지원 사격
Skill_MP_LegionMine_N_3.description: 양 옆의 아군 공격기가 공격하는 경우, 공격 대상이 자신의 사거리 내에 있으면 공격 지원을 합니다.

Skill_MP_TrainingDummy_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_TrainingDummy_N_3.name: 초기화
Skill_MP_TrainingDummy_N_3.description: 라운드 개시 시, 해로운 효과를 모두 해제합니다.

Skill_MP_Seljuq_N_7.title: askill7
Skill_MP_Seljuq_N_7.name: 203mm 곡사포 착탄 (몹)
Skill_MP_Seljuq_N_7.description: 2라운드 뒤에 착탄하는 곡사 포격으로 목표 지점에 {0} 피해를 줍니다. 목표 지점 주변에는 피해가 50% 감소합니다. 표식 상태인 대상에게는 피해량이 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_Mammoth_N_7.title: askill7
Skill_MP_Mammoth_N_7.name: 2연장 곡사포 (착탄)
Skill_MP_Mammoth_N_7.description: 1라운드 뒤에 착탄하는 곡사 포격으로 목표 지점에 {0} 피해를 줍니다. 목표 지점 주변에는 피해가 50% 감소합니다. 대상이 이동 불가 상태인 경우, 직격해 피해량이 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_1.name: 외피 장갑 활성화
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_1.description: 범위 내 아군에게 적용된 해로운 효과를 해제하고, 피해 무효화를 부여합니다.

Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_2.name: 동력 전달
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_2.description: 범위 내 아군에게 동력을 전달해 대상의 행동력 / 치명타 / 적중을 올려줍니다.

Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_3.name: 충격 흡수 장치
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_3.description: 라운드 개시 후 받는 공격을 일정 횟수 무효화합니다. HP가 50%이하기 되면 횟수가 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_4.name: 출력 증폭
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_4.description: 라운드 개시 시, 아군에게 무작위 강화 효과를 부여합니다.

Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_5.name: 동력로 파괴
Skill_MP_ExpGenerator_N_5.description: 파괴될 경우, 모든 아군의 행동력 / 공격력 / 방어력이 크게 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_NightChickSI_SS1_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_SS1_4.name: 위축
Skill_MP_NightChickSI_SS1_4.description: 전투 개시 시, 상대 진영에 램파트가 있을 경우 모든 아군의 방어력 / 회피가 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_FABigChick_SS1_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_FABigChick_SS1_4.name: 공포
Skill_MP_FABigChick_SS1_4.description: 전투 개시 시, 상대 진영에 램파트가 있을 경우 모든 아군의 공격력 / 적중이 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_Phalangites_SS1_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Phalangites_SS1_4.name: 의기소침
Skill_MP_Phalangites_SS1_4.description: 전투 개시 시, 상대 진영에 콘스탄챠 S2가 있을 경우 모든 아군의 방어력 / 행동력이 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_BigChick_SS1_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_BigChick_SS1_3.name: 사기 저하
Skill_MP_BigChick_SS1_3.description: 전투 개시 시, 상대 진영에 콘스탄챠 S2가 있을 경우 모든 아군의 공격력 / 치명타가 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_1.name: 2연장 리볼버 캐논
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_1.description: 리볼버 캐논으로 단일 대상에게 {0} 피해를 주고, 2라운드 동안 대상을 도발하며 적중을 감소시킵니다. 대상이 회피 또는 방어 감소 상태면 피해량이 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_2.name: F.F 미사일
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_2.description: 날치 미사일로 {0} 피해를 줍니다. 대상의 방어력을 일정 비율 무시하며, 대상이 도발 또는 방어 감소 상태면 피해량이 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_3.name: 우향선회
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_3.description: 공격 시, 회피가 증가하며 아래에 배치된 아군을 보호합니다. 보호 대상이 기동 / 중장형일 경우, 대상의 공격을 지원하며 적중과 치명타를 올려줍니다. 회피 증가 효과는 발동 라운드에 최대로 적용되며, 다음 라운드에 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_4.name: 오만과 분노
Skill_MP_Undine_EV5_4.description: 적을 처치하면 주변 아군을 도발해 2라운드 동안 자신과 아군의 능력치가 증가하지만, 아군은 회피가 감소합니다. 적을 추가로 처치하면 효과의 50%가 추가 적용됩니다. 스킬 레벨 10에서 범위가 증가합니다.

Skill_MP_ScoutEX_EW_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_ScoutEX_EW_1.name: 강화 충격탄

복수심 : 공격력 / 방어력 / 적중률 증가
끓어오르는 분노 : 해당 상태가 적용 되있을 시 <sec typ="note">분노의 칙 파이널 어택</sec> 스킬 사용

Skill_MP_Tracker_TU_2.name: Bloody Claw
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU_2.description:
Deals $(1.4) damage to target area, remove all buffs from target, and inflict Bleeding for 3 rounds.
Deal 50% less damage to non-primary target.
When affected by Frenzy, inflict Great Bleeding instead of Bleeding.
Target inflicted with Bleeding and Great Bleeding takes 150 / 200 Fixed Damage at the end of each round.

Skill_MP_Tracker_TU2_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU2_2.name: Bloody Claw
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU2_2.description:
Deals $(1.4) damage to target area, remove all buffs from target, and inflict Bleeding for 3 rounds.
Deal 50% less damage to non-primary target.
When affected by Frenzy, inflict Great Bleeding instead of Bleeding.
Target inflicted with Bleeding and Great Bleeding takes 250 / 300 Fixed Damage at the end of each round.

Skill_MP_Tracker_TU3_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU3_2.name: Bloody Claw
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU3_2.description:
Deals $(1.4) damage to target area, remove all buffs from target, and inflict Bleeding for 3 rounds.
Deal 50% less damage to non-primary target.
When affected by Frenzy, inflict Great Bleeding instead of Bleeding.
Target inflicted with Bleeding and Great Bleeding takes 350 / 400 Fixed Damage at the end of each round.

Skill_MP_Tracker_TU4_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU4_2.name: Bloody Claw
Skill_MP_Tracker_TU4_2.description:
Deals $(1.4) damage to target area, remove all buffs from target, and inflict Bleeding for 3 rounds.
Deal 50% less damage to non-primary target.
When affected by Frenzy, inflict Great Bleeding instead of Bleeding.
Target inflicted with Bleeding and Great Bleeding takes 450 / 500 Fixed Damage at the end of each round.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_1.name: 에너지 추출
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_1.description: <sec typ="note">에너지 고갈</sec> 상태에 빠져있을 시 주변 철충에게서 에너지를 추출합니다. 그리고 에너지를 추출 당한 철충은 죽음을 맞이 합니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_2.name: 죽음의 에너지
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_2.description: 내부에 저장된 막대한 에너지를 모아, 범위 내 적들에게 {0} 보호 무시 피해를 주는 죽음의 에너지를 방사합니다. 피격 당한 적은 해제 불가의 지속 물리 피해를 입습니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_3.name: 에너지 고갈
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_3.description: <sec typ="note">죽음의 에너지</sec> 스킬을 사용 시 막대한 에너지를 소비하게 되어 <sec typ="note">에너지 고갈</sec> 상태에 빠지게 됩니다. <sec typ="note">에너지 고갈</sec> 상태에 빠지게 되면 도발에 면역이 되며 주위 철충에게서 에너지를 추출하여 손실된 에너지를 보충합니다. 손실된 에너지가 보충이 되면 <sec typ="note">에너지 완충</sec> 상태가 되어 피해가 최소화 되고 해로운 효과에 면역이 됩니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_4.name: 에너지 흡수
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_4.description: 에너지 추출 시, 온 신경을 흡수에만 집중해 도발에 면역이 되고 2라운드 동안 행동을 정지합니다. 해당 상태에선 방어력이 감소하며, 받는 피해가 증가합니다. 30% 확률로 특정 속성 저항력이 감소합니다.

Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_5.name: 폭주
Skill_MP_DoomEater_N_EW3_5.description: 라운드 개시 시 자신에게 <sec typ="note">에너지 고갈</sec> 상태가 3중첩이라면 <sec typ="note">폭주</sec> 상태에 빠지게 되어 공격력 / 적중 / 효과 저항이 증가하지만 방어력이 감소합니다. <sec typ="note">에너지 고갈</sec> 상태가 5중첩이라면 방어막과 피해 감소 효과를 무시 합니다. <sec typ="note">폭주</sec> 능력은 중첩이 되며 해제 불가입니다.

Skill_TEST_Nest_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_1.name: 파멸 도래
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_1.description: 에너지 응집체를 발사해 {0} 피해를 줍니다. 대상이 <sec typ="note">침식</sec> 효과에 적용되어 있는 상태일 시 피해량이 증가합니다.

Skill_TEST_Nest_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_2.name: 침식
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_2.description: 목표 지점에 {0} 피해를 주는 침식체를 발사합니다. 목표 지점 주변은 피해가 25% 감소합니다. 적중 시, 30% 확률로 대상을 뒤로 밀고 공격력 / 방어력을 감소시킵니다. 공격력 / 방어력 감소 효과는 전투가 진행될수록 점감 됩니다.

Skill_TEST_Nest_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_3.name: 은총 하사
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_3.description:
주위 아군에게 자신의 HP에 따라 점차 강해지는 효과를 부여합니다.

은총 하사 1단계 (HP 100% ~ 70%) : 공격력 / 방어력 증가
은총 하사 2단계 (HP 70% ~ 40%) : 공격력 / 방어력 / 적중 증가
은총 하사 3단계 (HP 40% ~ 0%) : 공격력 / 방어력 / 적중 증가

Skill_TEST_Nest_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_4.name: 배리어 전개
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_4.description: 피격 시, <sec typ="note">배리어 전개 준비</sec> 상태가 되며 4회 중첩인 상태로 피격 시, 배리어가 전개되어 3라운드 동안 피해를 5회 무효화합니다. 배리어가 전개돼있는 동안 피격 시, 해로운 효과를 해제하고 아군이 사망 시, 배리어가 강제로 해제되어 3라운드 동안 받는 피해가 증가합니다.

Skill_TEST_Nest_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_5.name: 사출 시스템 파괴
Skill_TEST_Nest_N_5.description: <sec typ="note">배리어 전개</sec> 상태에서 속성 공격에 피격 시, <sec typ="note">사출 시스템 손상</sec> 상태가 되며 해당 상태가 3회 중첩 된 상태로 피격 시, <sec typ="note">사출 시스템 파괴</sec>가 되어 <sec typ="note">침식</sec> 스킬을 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_1.name: Execution Initiation
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_1.description:
Deals $(0.25) damage to a single target and grants Beheader ATK +50% for 2 rounds.
Inflicts 300 Fire DoT damage for 2 rounds when Crits.
This skill has +200% ACC.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_2.name: Beheading
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_2.description:
Deals $(2) damage to target area with Ignore Protect.
Ignore DR / Barrier if Beheader is affected by 10 or more Executioner stacks.
Consumes 10 Executioner stacks.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_3.name: Executioner
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_3.description:
When Beheader is hit, increases Beheader's ACC +20% / CRIT +10% permanently, but decreases ATK -8%.
When Beheader is attacked, grant Beheader Counterattack with 100% Power permanently.

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_4.name: Absorbent
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_4.description:
When Deheader is attacked, grants Beheader DEF +20000 for 1 round.
Increase Beheader's Status Resist +75% and grants Immunity to Stunned

Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_5.name: Stalemate
Skill_MP_Executioner_EW2_5.description: At the start of round, inflicts unremovable ATK -200% to all enemies for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_1.name: S.C Missile Attack
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to target area.
If there is only 1 enemy in target area, Additional DMG +500% and Ignore DR / Barrier.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_2.name: S.C Missle Aiming
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_2.description:
Deals $(1) damage to target area that Ignore Protect.
Additional DMG +500% and removes buffs if target is affected by Marked.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_3.name: Target Diversion
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_3.description:
At the start of round, inflicts DEF -25% / EVA -50% to enemies affected by Marked.
Effects increases to DEF -50% / EVA -100% if Marked is not a debuff.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_4.name: Combat Adaptation Circuit
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_4.description:
At the start of round, grant self permanent ACC / CRIT / Skill Multiplier / SPD +20% that stacks up to 5 times.
Grants unit Immunity to ATK- / SPD- / AP-.
Grants unit Area Damage Focus +100%.

Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_5.name: S.C Precise Aiming Circuit
Skill_MP_NightChickM_RV_5.description:
At the start of round, if unit is not affected by Provoked, grants unit ACC / CRIT / Defense Penetration +50% for 1 round.
At the start of round, if unit is affected by Provoked, inflicts unit ACC / CRIT / Defense Penetration -50% for 1 round.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_1.name: S.C Shield Blow
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target.
Inflicts 200 Fixed damage and removes buffs if target is affected by Provoked.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_2.name: S.C Defensive Posture
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_2.description:
Grants all allies for 3 rounds / AP +1.
Grants all allies DEF +20% permenently that stacks 5 times.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_3.name: Threat Diversion
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_3.description:
At the start of round, inflicts Provoked / AP -1 / ATK -20% / Defense Penetration -20% to enemies with higher ATK than unit.
At the start of round, inflicts Skill Multiplier -20% / -10% to enemies if unit is on the Frontline / Middleline for 1 round.
At the start of round, inflicts Skill Multiplier -20% / -10% to enemies on the Backline / Middleline for 1 round.
When an ally is defeated, inflicts unremovable Skill Multiplier -30% to enemies affected by Provoked for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_4.name: Combat Adaptation Circuit
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_4.description:
At the start of round, grants unit permanent ATK +500 / DEF +500 / SPD +10% / Status Resist +10% that stack 5 times.
At the start of wave, if unit is affected by Elemental Resist Debuff, grant unit unremovable Elemental Resist Reversal of the corresponding Element for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_5.name: Chick Defense Formation
Skill_MP_NightChickS_RV_5.description:
At the start of round, grants unit Row Protect / Column Protect.
At the start of round, grants allies with less than 50% HP unremovable Area Damage Dispersion +25% permanently.
When an ally is defeated, grants unit unremovable Area Damage Dispersion +25% permanently.

Skill_MP_Intruder_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_1.name: Jamming Missile
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_1.description:
Deals $(0.5) damage to target area that Ignore Protect.
When hit, removes ATK / SPD buffs.
If target has less EVA than unit, inflicts ACC -25% / CRIT -25% for 2 rounds regardless of hit.
Removes Target Protect applied to unit after this skill is used.

Skill_MP_Intruder_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_2.name: Interception Preparation
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_2.description:
Remove debuffs and grant Range +1 / ACC +25% / CRIT +25% for 3 rounds to allies in Area of Effect.
If ally's HP is lower than 50%, also grant Counterattack with 100% Power (1 time) for 3 rounds to that ally.

Skill_MP_Intruder_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_3.name: High Frequency Jammer
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_3.description:
At the start of round, inflicts Skill Multiplier -20% / -10% to enemies on the Backline / Middleline for 1 round.
When unit is defeated while affected by Target Protect, inflicts unremovable Skill Multiplier / ACC -30% for 3 rounds to all enemies.
When unit is defeated while not affected by Target Protect, removes all debuffs and grants AP +2 to all enemies.

Skill_MP_Intruder_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_4.name: AWACS
Skill_MP_Intruder_N_4.description:
At the start of the 1st / 2nd / 3rd / 4th round or after, grants all allies unremovable Area Damage Dispersion +100% / 85% / 70% / 50% for 1 round.
When unit's attacks hit, grants all allies ACC / EVA +20% for 2 rounds.
When unit is attacked, grants all allies AP +0.5.

Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_1.name: Disarming Shoot
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target.
When hit, inflicts ATK / CRIT -25% for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_2.name: Access Denial
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_2.description:
Deal $(1) damage to target area.
Damage decreases by 50% to non-center area.
When hit, Push Back 1 cell.

Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_3.name: Penetration Resistance
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_3.description: At the start of round, grants unit Column Protect / DR +25% / DEF +50% / Defense Penetration Resist for 1 round.

Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_4.name: Fixed Trench
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_4.description:
At the start of round, grants unremovable Target Protect to Attacker / Supporter allies behind on the same row.
At the start of round, grants Protected targets Minimize Damage (1 time) and Minimum Elemental Resist +50% for 1 round.

Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_5.name: Unbreakable Citadel
Skill_MP_HauntedFortress_N_5.description: As long as there are Protected allies, unit has unremovable Battle Continuation with 25% HP.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_1.name: Beat
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a target area, Push Back 1 Cell with 30% chance to inflict Stunned for 2 rounds.
If Predator is affected by Attribute Absorption, inflicts 500 DoT damage of the corresponding element for 3 rounds.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_2.name: Contaminated Liquid
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_2.description:
Deals $(0.5) damage to target area with Ignore Protect and inflicts Corrosion / DEF -30% / SPD -20% for 2 rounds.
This skill has +200% ACC.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_3.name: Attribute Absorption
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_3.description:
When Predator is hit with an elemental attack, increases Predator's Elemental Resist of that element but decreases Elemental Resist of another for 3 rounds.
Fire Attack: Fire Resist +50% / Ice Resist -25%.
Ice Attack: Ice Resist +50% / Electric Resist -25%.
Electric Attack: Electric Resist +50% / Fire Resist -25%.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_4.name: Contaninant Leak
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_4.description: At the start of round, if Predator has less than 75% HP, inflicts Elemental Resist -100% / DoT damage equals to 5% ATK to all enemies for 1 round.

Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_5.name: Protective Instinct
Skill_MP_Predator_EW2_5.description: When Predator is attacked, removes all debuffs from Predator, except from Attribute Absorption, and grants Barrier +5000 for 1 round.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_1.name: Set Target
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_1.description: Deals $(1) damage to a single target and inflicts Marked / Damage Taken Increased +15% for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_2.name: Warning Fire
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_2.description: Deals $(0.25) damage to a single target with Ignore Protect and inflicts ACC / EVA -30% for 2 rounds regardless of hit.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_3.name: Distributive Processing System
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_3.description:
At the start of round, grant unit buffs depending on the number of allies:
3 or more: SPD +30%.
5 or more: Status Resist +50%.
7 or more: Area Damage Dispersion +70%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_4.name: Contingency Plan
Skill_MP_MarionnetteAR_N_4.description: When unit is defeated, grant all allies AP +1.5 / ATK +25% / CRIT +15% / DR +15% for 2 rounds that stack up to 4 times each.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_1.name: 122mm APFSDS
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_1.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target and with Defense Penetration +40%.
Additional DMG +25% to Heavy enemies.
Additional DMG +25% to Defender enemies.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_2.name: Napalm Shot Bombardment
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_2.description: Deals $(0.75) damage to target area and inflicts Damage Taken Increased +25% / 250 Fire DoT damage for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_3.name: Distributive Processing System
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_3.description:
At the start of round, grant unit buffs depending on the number of allies:
3 or more: SPD +30%.
5 or more: Status Resist +50%.
7 or more: Area Damage Dispersion +70%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_4.name: Shot Control Network
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHW_N_4.description:
After attacking, grant self buff for 1 attack.
If Hit: Re-Attack.
If Miss: ACC+ 200%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_1.name: 2-round Armor Piercing Rapid-fire Cannon
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_1.description: Deals $(0.75) damage to a single target and inflicts Marked / DEF -20% for 2 rounds.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_2.name: Shell Shock Round Shooting
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_2.description:
Deals $(1) damage to a single target and Push Back 1 cell.
Additional DMG +50% / +25% if target is on the Frontline / Middleline.
Additional DMG +50% / +25% if unit is on the Frontline / Middleline.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_3.name: Distributive Processing System
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_3.description:
At the start of round, grant unit buffs depending on the number of allies:
3 or more: SPD +30%.
5 or more: Status Resist +50%.
7 or more: Area Damage Dispersion +70%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_4.name: Crossed Shielding Armor
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_4.description:
At the start of odd round, grants unit unremovable Row Protect for 1 round.
At the start of even round, grants unit unremovable Column Protect for 1 round.
At the start of round, grants allies in Area of Effect DR +30% for 1 round.
At the start of round, grants self and allies not affected by Row Protect / Column Protect in Area of Effect DR +30%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_5.name: Revenge Protocol
Skill_MP_MarionnetteHA_N_5.description:
At the start of round, grant unit Counterattack (2 times, 1 round) depending on the number of allies:
3 or less: with 200% Power.
4-6: with 150% Power.
7 or more: with 100% Power.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_1.title: askill1
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_1.name: Remove Target
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_1.description:
Deals $(1.1) damage to a single target.
Lower enemy's HP is, increases DMG dealt up to +50%.
Additional DMG +25% and inflicts SPD -25% for 2 rounds to targets affected by Marked.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_2.title: askill2
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_2.name: Perforating Shell
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_2.description:
Deals $(0.9) damage to target area.
Additional DMG +25% and inflicts AP -2 to targets affected by Marked.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_3.title: askill3
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_3.name: Distributive Processing System
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_3.description:
At the start of round, grant unit buffs depending on the number of allies:
3 or more: SPD +30%.
5 or more: Status Resist +50%.
7 or more: Area Damage Dispersion +70%.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_4.title: askill4
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_4.name: Designated Marksman
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_4.description:
At the start of round, grants allies in Area of Effect Follow Up Attack for 1 round.
When unit's attacks hit, grant allies in Area of Effect DEF / EVA +20% for 3 rounds that stack up to 5 times each.

Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_5.title: askill5
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_5.name: Adaptive Tactic
Skill_MP_MarionnetteDM_N_5.description:
At the start of wave, grant unit permanent, unremovable buffs depending on enemy team composition:
2 or more Light: Anti-Light DMG +30% / CRIT +30%.
2 or more Heavy: Anti-Heavy DMG +30% / Defense Penetration +30%.
2 or more Flying: Anti-Flying DMG +30% / ACC +30%.
